description.ko: ECHO-0는 청각 데이터와 시각 예술의 접점을 탐구하는 실험적 프로젝트로, 주파수와 진폭에 반응하여 음파를 역동적이고 몰입감 있는 디지털 풍경으로 변환합니다.
description.en: ECHO-0 is an experimental project exploring the intersection of auditory data and visual art, transforming sound waves into dynamic, immersive digital landscapes that react to frequency and amplitude.

prompt: Cinematic visualization of sound waves, ECHO-0 project, digital abstract particles vibrating in a dark void, neon blue and gold frequencies, architectural data visualization, high resolution, 8k, futuristic aesthetic, rhythmic wave patterns.
